openjsip.proxy

Class Proxy

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      • java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
        • java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
          • openjsip.proxy.Proxy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable, java.rmi.Remote, RemoteServiceInterface

    public class Proxy
extends java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
implements RemoteServiceInterface, java.lang.Runnable

      • SNMP_ROOT_OID

        protected static final java.lang.String SNMP_ROOT_OID
        SNMP root oid. This is where all our objects reside. The current value corresponds to .iso.org.dod.internet.private.enterprises. 1937 is our random generated value for (OpenJSIP), but normally this number is to be given by IANA. The next value correspond to: 1 - OpenJSIP Location service 2 - OpenJSIP Registrar service 3 - OpenJSIP Proxy service
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • validateRequest

        public boolean validateRequest(Request request,
                      SipProvider sipProvider,
                      ServerTransaction serverTransaction,
                      LocationServiceInterface locationService)
                        throws InvalidArgumentException,
                               SipException,
                               java.text.ParseException
        Validates incoming requests. See section 16.3 RFC 3261. Sends error responses if request is not valid.
        Parameters:
        request - Request to validate
        sipProvider - SipProvider object
        serverTransaction - Associated server transaction if any
        Returns:
        true - request is valid, false - otherwise (error response is also sent).
        Throws:
        InvalidArgumentException
        SipException
        java.text.ParseException

                                 throws UserNotFoundException,
                                        java.rmi.RemoteException
        Perfoms authorization on request
        Parameters:
        request - Request
        dsam -
        Returns:
        true if request has passed authorization
        Throws:
        UserNotFoundException - If specified subscriber in request was not found in location service database
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Location Service connection troubles

      • checkServerTransaction

        private ServerTransaction checkServerTransaction(SipProvider sipProvider,
                                       Request request,
                                       ServerTransaction st)
        Creates a new ServerTransaction object that will handle the request if necessary and if request type is to be handled by transactions.
        Parameters:
        sipProvider - SipProvider object
        request - Incoming request
        st - ServerTransaction that was retrieved from RequestEvent
        Returns:

      • forwardRequest

        public void forwardRequest(URI targetURI,
                  Request request,
                  SipProvider sipProvider,
                  ServerTransaction serverTransaction,
                  boolean statefullForwarding)
                    throws InvalidArgumentException,
                           java.text.ParseException,
                           SipException
        Forwards request to specified target.
        Parameters:
        targetURI - Target to forward request. If it is null, target will be existing RequestURI of request or taken from Route header if exists.
        request - Request to forward
        sipProvider - SipProvider object
        serverTransaction - ServerTransaction that handles this request. If null, the request will be forwarded statelessly.
        statefullForwarding - If true and serverTransaction != null, the request will be forwarded statefully, otherwise, it will be forwarded statelessly.
        Throws:
        InvalidArgumentException
        java.text.ParseException
        SipException

      • cancelPendingTransactions

        private void cancelPendingTransactions(ClientTransaction[] clientTransactions,
                             SipProvider sipProvider)
                                throws SipException
        Generates and sends CANCEL requests for all pending client transactions.
        Parameters:
        clientTransactions - An array with client transactions. Each will be checked for being "pending".
        sipProvider - SipProvider object
        Throws:
        SipException

      • checkResponseContext

        private void checkResponseContext(TransactionsMapping transactionsMapping)
        This functions gets the best response from response context and forwards it to recipient under following circumstances: - Server transaction is not yet completed - All client transactions are completed
        Parameters:
        transactionsMapping - Transactions mapping object

      • sendResponseImmediately

        private void sendResponseImmediately(Response outgoingResponse,
                           TransactionsMapping transactionsMapping)
                              throws InvalidArgumentException,
                                     SipException
        Processes steps of response immediate forwarding. See section 16.7 step 5. Any response chosen for immediate forwarding MUST be processed as described in steps "Aggregate Authorization Header Field Values" through "Record-Route".
        Parameters:
        outgoingResponse - Response to send
        transactionsMapping - Transaction mapping
        Throws:
        InvalidArgumentException
        SipException

      • execCmd

        public java.lang.String execCmd(java.lang.String cmd,
                       java.lang.String[] parameters)
                         throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Description copied from interface: RemoteServiceInterface
        Executes internal command. It is used by command-line client. Client may ask service to get help on all commands by sending cmd 'help'.
        Specified by:
        execCmd in interface RemoteServiceInterface
        Parameters:
        cmd - Command to execute
        parameters - Parameters if any
        Returns:
        Result
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
